name: get_weather_forecast
description: Retrieves detailed weather forecast for a specific location and date range, including temperature, precipitation, humidity, and severe weather alerts

location.description: City, state/province, or zip code for weather forecast

include_hourly.description: Whether to include hourly breakdown of weather conditions

name: get_current_produce_orders
description: Retrieves current produce orders scheduled for delivery or pickup, including quantities, types of produce, delivery locations, and timing

date_range_start.description: Start date for order retrieval in YYYY-MM-DD format

date_range_end.description: End date for order retrieval in YYYY-MM-DD format

location_filter.description: Optional filter to show orders for specific delivery location or region

name: analyze_weather_produce_impact
description: Analyzes how specific weather conditions affect different types of produce in terms of demand, shelf life, transportation, and storage requirements

produce_types.description: List of produce types to analyze impact for

name: get_supply_chain_alerts
description: Retrieves current supply chain alerts and disruptions that may be weather-related, including supplier delays, transportation issues, and warehouse capacity constraints

region.description: Geographic region to check for supply chain alerts
